name: Prison -0
description:
Prison -0 is a short text game where you need to break out of Prison -0 (pronounced Prison negative zero) which is located halfway up Mount Everest. The prison got its name -0 because it always below zero in the prison. (This is also my first game :D)

Instructions: At the end of each dialogue in the parenthesis is the options you have and how to spell them and if you accidentally type it wrong the game restarts to the begging but that shouldn't be a problem as the game is super short.
